titles.title: O How He Loves You and Me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh, how He loves you and me
Oh, how He loves you and me
He gave his life
What more could He give
Oh, how He loves you
Oh, how He loves me
Oh, how He loves you and me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus to Calvary did go,
His love for sinners to show.
What He did there
brought hope from despair.
Oh, how He loves you;
Oh, how He loves me;
Oh, how He loves you and me.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Oh, how He loves you and me,
Oh how He loves you and me.
He gave his life, what
more could He give?
Oh, how He loves you;
Oh, how He loves me;
Oh, how He loves you and me.
